subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: College coaches will have to recruit the old-fashioned way next year. The N.C.A.A.’s board approved a ban yesterday on text messages from coaches to recruits beginning in August, but could revisit that legislation as early as 2008. The move comes a week after the N.C.A.A.’s management council recommended the ban.
